intro.content:
Hey {{ contact.FIRSTNAME }}, how‚Äôs everything going?
In today‚Äôs newsletter there's plenty to see and watch so let‚Äôs not waste a minute and hop on this joyful train. Here are the stops we'll make today:
  • Look back at 2020 by playing a fun game and see what‚Äôs coming up next in tech.
  • Marvel over the Ice sculptures of the British artist, Andy Goldsworthy!
  • And obviously checkout the Animal Corner section to have your weekly shot of cuteness ;-)
Let's ride!

hero.description: To increase our happiness, we need better questions than ‚ÄúWhat accomplishments should be on my scorecard?‚Äù
hero.title: True Success Is More Than Checking Boxes
hero.why:
If you know me well, you probably already know that I am a huge fan of todo-list. This is my preferred way to keep track of things and it really helps me achieve professional goals as well as organise my personal life.
However, an important question with this is: does all of this make me really happy? I won‚Äôt give you the answer but have a look at this long article from the Atlantic. It quite opened up my eyes.
